name: Blackstone (itch)
description:
Blackstone is a hack and slash action adventure game that puts players on a vengeance quest to put an end to a mad scientist who is destroying the kingdom. After discovering a source of bio-fuel, an experiment creates rifts into another dimension, causing everything to morph into a hideous and corrupt form.

Join Isabella  Elwood on her quest to destroy Dr Frederick Artorius, as she journeys through  two dimensions and explore the  large interconnected Kingdom of Blackstone in an attempt to defeat the Mad Scientist and his Four Generals.
